August 7, 2022 - First experience with an Airbnb rental and I was nervous about staying in an unknown person's room in the backyard. I read all the reviews, prior to booking and decided to take a chance. I was pleasantly surprised. My experience with Catherine (via text) and her mother, Ruth (in person) were both very pleasant and ready to answer any questions. "The Birdhouse" will have us returning! My husband and I could not have been more pleased with the cleanliness, the toiletries, and the beautiful details of the curtains with the birds, and the bird and eucalyptus ornament on the wall. The bed was comfortable, and we appreciated that the room cooled down very quickly. I loved the thank you note posted on the inside of the door with both their numbers in case you needed anything. Ruth greeted us and made us feel welcomed with her big smile and then gave us our total privacy. No ants or other insects were seen either inside or outside (mentioned in one review). It was a totally wonderful experience; we will and encourage everyone to support small family businesses.
Javier and Rosemary Barrera.
